mapper.select: select f.id, f.file_origin_name, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.file_size, f.file_content_type, f.created_datetime, f.updated_datetime from tbl_file f join tbl_company_profile_file cpf on f.id = cpf.file_id where cpf.company_id = #{companyId} order by f.created_datetime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_file ( file_origin_name, file_name, file_path, file_size, file_content_type ) values ( #{fileOriginName}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType} )
